item.title: The Character Network of Harry Potter
item.description: In Harry Potter, there are many characters. That includes both allies and friends of Harry, enemies in terms of school mate rivals, enemies in terms of characters who want him killed, and others who are somewhat neutral. Their school, Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, has four, so-called, houses: Gryffindor Slytherin Hufflepuff Ravenclaw The different houses have signature colors to their uniforms; red, green, yellow and blue, respectively.
